728816f-b.text:
Emerson Hill, Staten Island: Viewing south across Clove Road (at Price Street) and showing new fashionable
residences rising on the hill.
View 1: April 22, 1932
View 2: June 5, 1931
P. L. Sperr

729383f-c.text:
(1)
Richmond Road, east side, between Clove Road and Prioe Street, ahowing street car barns and offices (building in center) of the trolley company. The view is northward from Clove Road.
July 6, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
A view of old street cars beside the barns.
July 6, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
Another view of the old trolleys.
July 6, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.

729384f-a.text:
Richmond Road, at Clove Road: though not a native of Staten ssland, Al Swith (former Governor Alfred Emanuel Smith),
has his admirers there, too.
June 23, 1937.
F.L. Sperr
